testcase.name: withOutContenttypeMultiPart

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"createdBy":"Ramanan","teamSize":6,"projectName":"Singathicart42","status":"created"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("multipart/form-data", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
